briefTitle: Longitudinal Study of Behavioral Changes, Economic and Sociological After CAncer
officialTitle: Longitudinal Study of Behavioral Changes, Economic and Sociological After CAncer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: long term evolution of quality of life for patient with breast cancer or melanoma
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* diagnosis of cancer (breast or melanoma) since less than 1 month
* no metastasis
* Inform Consent Form signed

Exclusion Criteria:

* severe psychiatric disorder (depression, psychosis, etc.)
* addictive pathology
* longtime antidepressant treatment (\> 3 months)
* Patient pregnant or breastfeeding
